title: English-Pea Soup
directions: In a large stockpot over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add fennel, carrot, and parsnip and saut√© until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes.
Add vegetable broth, increase heat to high, and bring to a simmer. Add peas and cook until tender and bright green, about 2 minutes.
Garnish soup with scallions, radishes, and herbs and serve.
ingredients: 8 c. homemade vegetable broth (see Vegetable Broth recipe) or store-bought
1 lb. fresh or frozen English peas
